LongDescription:
QuickTime who? 
 ScreenRecordModule allows you to record your tvOS screen with ease! 
 No more QuickTime... no more mess! AirDrops a breeze! 
 Delete all you recordings in Settings! 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3)
